website_summaries.verdict: This gas-powered chainsaw is easier on the body with its 5-point anti-vibration system and cushioned handle.
pros: Ideal for cutting firewood and felling small-to-medium trees
QuickStart feature makes the pull cord easier to use
Comes with a heavy-duty carrying case, and bar and chain oil
cons: Requires a 40:1 gasoline/oil ratio mix to run
On/off safety button does not work as expected

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box and Amazon and Manufacturer are pointing fingers at each other
customer_reviews.text: This wouldn't start no matter what I tried - even though it's brand new, Amazon told me through chat they will NOT return it (it doesn't say that anywhere on the product page) and that I'd have to go through the manufacturer. After being on the phone with them "troubleshooting" for an hour, they tell me I have to return it through Amazon. They insisted that was the only way to return it since it was new and sold through Amazon. After going back again to amazon, they simply say "This item is confirmed as non returnable".
customer_reviews.author: TerraFirma

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My family has a small cabin and needed some help maintaining the grounds. I bought this to cut up and clear fallen trees. At first I really loved it. It was doing a great job cutting up a fallen tree. But I had to keep stopping to adjust the chain. It kept coming loose. Even popped off twice. I know in the manual it said you would have to adjust it on your first use, but this seemed a bit much. I had to stop every 5 minutes. The chain is now dull after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Yost

customer_reviews.title: bad air filter design, runs poorly
customer_reviews.text: The air filter became clogged after just a few minutes in a saw-dusty environment and let sawdust in past the filter somehow. I had to get carburetor maintenance done almost immediately due to power loss. It has never run smoothly or with full power again, and I'm afraid its short use did permanent damage. I can't reach MTD Products at all, and their local service reps tell me they don't want to work with MTD/Remington anymore. It doesn't restart easily when warm. Total piece of crap. I regret this purchase and am trying to return it and buy a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: John Norvell

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I needed to cut down some small trees and buck up some larger branches so I bought this. Fired right up and laid waste to the yard work I needed to complete if I ever wanted to engage in coitus with my wife again. Needless to say, coitus was had and everyone was happy. I just need some more excuses to use it, because using the saw is almost a sexual and/or spiritual experience itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Flegal

customer_reviews.title: Great , so far. Will update later,  with more use
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today, WOW, if it continues to run like it has today, it's well worth the money. I've had poulan pro, husqvarna, and couple of others, for I need around the property, this will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap! Not able to keep running or adjust!
customer_reviews.text: Would not keep running. Needed to adjust carburetor but screws have coverings on them so you can not fix it. When running it died after 5 - 10 minutes and then had to cool down. The worst nightmare ever seen. This saw was SO BAD that Amazon told me to forget returning it and just trash it!! Amazon has THE BEST customer service but the saw stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Chestertown Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good starting
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and I will give it 5 stars if it is still performing well in a month the second time I used it it started better and faster than the initial time and that is a big plus because I threw the last saw away because it took forever to start
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Feel
customer_reviews.text: Saw was delivered sooner than expected and packaged well. Seems that the other reviews are correct, the Saw seems to be well built and solid. Case seems to be heavy duty enough. I have not had a chance to gas it up and cut anything but will update my review once I have which is why I have only given 4 stars. I expect to give 5 stars once I have had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews hoping for a good one at a decent price. The packaging is very good and the case is heavy duty. This is NOT a cheap chinese knock off, it is an actual well build chainsaw. Cranked as promised and cut through red oak limbs very easily. I will update as I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull and Broken.
customer_reviews.text: Engine runs ok. However, the chain is very dull, and the case came broken in several spots, it won't even close or latch. Not to mention its also not eligible for returns. Very disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The plastic-covered box had already been BROKEN before delivery. It is no use to me. Big disappointed. Piece of junk. However, I haven't tried the saw. I will come back and give you feedback on how it works. I tried the saw briefly, and ut seemed to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: joua t her

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this to cut some small logs for our fireplace. After about 15 minutes it stopped and refused to restart. We waited, thinking it might have gotten hot, but it never started again. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the price
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new house had 10 trees to cut down this saw went threw em like butter the chain did get daal pretty quick tho had to by replacement chains.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This works like a champ. Right out of box, had to adjust some things (normal) but cut like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: 2003 Chevy

customer_reviews.title: Quick to start, and idles well
customer_reviews.text: Mine cuts well, engine is strong and reliable. However the chain oil leaks out at the chain during storage. So every time I go to use it I have a big mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mule

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly powerful chainsaw that I used for cutting several large tree limbs after a bad snow storm. Cuts like butter through large limbs and very easy to use as this was my first gas chainsaw purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alison Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love this saw it is cheap and starts easy and it’s a bliss to cut through very hard wood? Will soon be cutting down 2 trees will update on result
customer_reviews.author: nikita

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Started right up and took care of cutting up the 6 trees we needed cut up with ease. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephs5kids

customer_reviews.title: Haven't even used it yet & I'm contemplating returning it.
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box & case latches are broken. Case isn't really heavy duty if latches broke off while still in original packaging. That's my first tip off it's junk.Probably going to return it rather than take the chance the saw is crap, I already know the case is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Malone

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Enabled us Northwoods girls to easily handle the U.P. winter
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Broken Case
customer_reviews.text: I think the saw will work just fine for what I need it for! But the case was broken inside and one of the latches to the case was broke.. I hoping I can get a new case sent to me?
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Bock

customer_reviews.title: Great chainsaw!
customer_reviews.text: Great chainsaw! We really like it. Wish it had a sturdier case as thecase has cracked in 2 places already.
customer_reviews.author: wildwolf

customer_reviews.title: Purring Power
customer_reviews.text: This runs so great! Starts easy every time. Cuts with little effort. And sounds so smooth as it runs. 18in is a great length. Handles light with plenty of power. I don't comment much but i had to on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kolczaski

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money you spend
customer_reviews.text: Does what we need it to do. It's really not heavy, weighs about the same as our old one. The chain is a cheap one but thankfully all out other chains we bought for the old one fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Amazons return policy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two weeks, chain and bar lube wont work, and now I have to go out of my way to find a service Centre to decide if it can be fixed before I can Get a refund when that's all I wanted, seems Amazons return policy is not all it seems
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Oil leak
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and started to leak oil in the second month....not usable. Total loss of money
customer_reviews.author: Jijeesh Thottathil

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Great saw starts easy cuts fantastic. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: David West

customer_reviews.title: The case must have protected the saw!!!
customer_reviews.text: Chainsaw works great, however 3 stars because the storage case came mangled with a split and 2 busted hinges, making it unusable... please send a new case so I can add stars to my review!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Saw works great but case came broken...they sent a replacement and that's broken too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory in most regards
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but it is annoyingly easy to bump the off switch with my thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Towner

customer_reviews.title: Deals
customer_reviews.text: Quit working the first day of use. Since I bought this item and I did not use it till today first time because I travel outside the country, Started very good and after while quite working.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Bayoumi

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: Product came smelling like gas with wet string attachment inside gas tank with no oil included, clearly not "NEW"
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Worked like charm charm right out of the box. Perfect for light duty for the average homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large tree cutting
customer_reviews.text: Chain saw can endure rough projects. Helped us clear a few trees from our back yard. Good tool!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It’s performance matched the description and has been operating great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Houser

customer_reviews.title: But This Machine.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely great. Reviews on starting issues etc., common y'all, it's a mechanical carburated machine.. it will need tweaks from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henning

product_meta.title: Remington RM4218 Rebel 42cc 2-Cycle 18-Inch Gas Powered Chainsaw with Heavy Duty Carry Case-Automatic Chain Oiler-Anti Vibration System, 42cc-18
product_meta.description: Remington RM4218 Rebel 42cc 2-Cycle 18-Inch Gas Powered Chainsaw with Heavy Duty Carrying Case, QuickStart, 5-Point Anti Vibration System and Tool-Free Access is engineered with efficient power to cut through small to medium trees and manage other tough jobs easily. The heavy duty, durable 42cc full-crank engine provides greater power, less vibration and longer equipment life. QuickStart technology, for easy to pull starting, gets you up and running instantly. The Remington Rebel Gas Powered Chainsaw also features a premium 18" bar and low-kickback chain for all-around superior performance. Chain brake is inertia activated for safety while operating. Heavy Duty die-cast chassis and pro-grade components enhance durability while reducing the weight of the unit, and a 5-point Anti Vibration system, coupled with the cushioned wrap handle, reduces vibration and fatigue while increasing control and maneuverability, whether cutting through branches, slim or medium trees. A robust side-mounted tensioning system saves time and ensures chain tension stays consistent, as chain adjustments are quickly made while working. The auto oiler system maintains the proper amount of lubricant on the chain, helps to keep the chain sharp, in addition to ensuring the saw cuts smoothly and safely. Tool less access to the spark plug and air filter provides quick and easy access to cleaning and replacement. Heavy Duty Storage/Carrying Case, 2-Cycle Oil Included. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty. With the RM4218 Rebel 42cc 18” Chainsaw not only will you have quality lawn equipment that is reliable, easy-to-use, and powerful, but with Remington, you will have a Yard Well Done.
feature_bullets: HIGH OUTPUT ENGINE WITH 18-INCH BAR & CHAIN: 42cc full crank 2 cycle engine provides greater power and less vibration. 18-Inch sprocket tipped bar and chain cut through small and medium trees with ease
QUICKSTART TECHNOLOGY: Designed for quicker, smoother and easier pull starts
DURABLE DIE-CAST CHASSIS: Lightweight, heavy duty and efficient. Engineered with pro-grade components to cut through even the toughest wood
AUTOMATIC OILER: Keeps the proper amount of lubricant on the chain to ensure the saw cuts smoothly and safely
COMFORTABLE USAGE: 5-point anti-vibration system and a cushioned full wrap handle makes this chainsaw more balanced, maneuverable and comfortable to operate
EASY MAINTENANCE: Tool-free easy access to spark plug and filter, side-mounted screw tensioning system for quick adjustments while working

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars86 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
